article_title: Obamacare Is Destroying Jobs--And Here's The Evidence

article_metadata.description: Our search was by no means comprehensive, yet it turned up reports from nearly every state showing that ObamaCare is forcing employers to eliminate jobs, reduce hiring, and reduce workers' hours.
article_metadata.author: Michael F. Cannon
